oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry Network Broadcast - 1954-12-18
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This recording is of the Grand Ole Opry radio show on December 18, 1954. The tape features performers like: Hank Snow, Faron Young, Rod Brasfield, Minnie Pearl, Del Wood, and Grandpa Jones. Tape is the seventh of an unidentified number of tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Faron Young; Hank Snow; Grant Turner; Rod Brasfield; Minnie Pearl; Grandpa Jones; Del Wood;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Commercial for Harvey's, Nashville's largest store -- (00:24) Audio cuts out -- (00:43) Grand Ole Opry radio program begins -- (00:50) Golden Rocket (Hank Snow) -- (02:51) Hank Snow previews the shows line up -- (03:29) Hank Snow and Rod Brasfield talk and joke -- (07:17) Prince Albert (P.A.) tobacco commercial with Hank Snow and Grant Turner -- (08:21) Hank Snow introduces and talks to Faron Young -- (08:51) If You Ain't Lovin', You Ain't Livin' (Faron Young) -- (11:09) Square dancing -- (11:58) The Last Mile Of The Way (Hank Snow) -- (14:33) P.A. tobacco with Grant Turner and Hank Snow -- (15:34) Just Because (Del Wood) -- (16:36) Hank Snow introduces Minnie Pearl -- (16:52) Minnie Pearl talks about mistletoe and Christmas -- (18:05) Rod Brasfield joins Minnie in skit and impersonates Hank Snow -- (21:11) Hank Snow brings Faron Young back out -- (21:32) A Place For Girls Like You (Faron Young) -- (23:47) Mountain Dew (Grandpa Jones) -- (25:42) Let Me Go Lover (Hank Snow) -- (28:07) End of program and preview of next week -- (29:06) Commercial [cut off]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Snow, Hank; Young, Faron; Brasfield, Rod; Brasfield, Rod, 1910-1958; Minnie Pearl; Grandpa Jones; Grandpa Jones, 1913-1998; Grand Ole Opry (Radio program); Wood, Del
